com.cloudia.cloudia_android

Class CloudiaActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.cloudia.cloudia_android.BaseActivity
        • com.cloudia.cloudia_android.CloudiaActivity

  • public class CloudiaActivity
extends BaseActivity
    Main Activity of the app. Connect the app to the database and show the stations list. The user can choose a station and the app will show the page of the station.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CloudiaActivity

        public CloudiaActivity()

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Download a local copy of the database on the cellphone when we open the app for the first time. If there is already a copy of the database, it only fetch the data from the database. The first time, it can takes several minutes to create the local database.
        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState -

      • onWindowFocusChanged

        public void onWindowFocusChanged(boolean hasFocus)
        When we give focus to the app, it checks if the database is populated. If not, it tries to connect to the database and download the changes.
        Parameters:
        hasFocus - Verify if the window as focus

      • populateStationList

        public void populateStationList()
        Populates the list with the stations informations
